name: Rock Blasters
description:
Please play in full screen as the aspect ratio doesn't want to fit to Itch.io properly!

Come by, take a seat and grab a friend for a 5 minute action scene where you both have to watch each other's backs to survive. 

Player 1 is Blue

  • W is forward thrust
  • A and D are left and right rotation
  • SpaceBar to Fire

Player 2 is Green

  • Up Arrow is forward thrust
  • right and left arrows are left and right rotation
  • Left mouse button to Fire

if a player dies he will drop a soul that the other play may pick up in order to revive them!

Your goal is to have at least one player survive the 5 minute countdown. As you progress you will encounter colored rocks. Only the Player with the corresponding color may destroy those rocks. Player 1 can destroy blue rocks, Player 2 can destroy green rocks. This makes it vary difficult for a single player to complete the game, so work together!

This is my first ever completed Game Jam Game so I hope you all enjoy! I wont win but at the least i hope you had at least a few minutes of enjoyment during your game scrolling adventures!

#BonfireGameJam, You Cant Do It Alone!

Is your game eligible for the prize? Nope I wouldnt be able to make the trip, ;w;

List the pre-made assets if you used any in your game: None!
